title: Consumption Deflator
notes: This series is the deflator for PCE Nondurable Goods and PCE Services.  For additional details see: R. DiCecio (2009). "Sticky wages and sectoral labor comovement," Journal of Economic Dynamics and Control, 33(3): 538-53. (http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.jedc.2008.08.003).

title: Equipment Deflator
notes: For additional details see: R. DiCecio (2009). "Sticky wages and sectoral labor comovement," Journal of Economic Dynamics and Control, 33(3): 538-53. (http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.jedc.2008.08.003).

title: Equipment and Software Deflator (DISCONTINUED)
notes: This series was discontinued. Under the new NIPA organization, Equipment and Software is presented as two separate series. Current equipment deflator is available at https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/EDEF. For additional details see: R. DiCecio (2009). "Sticky wages and sectoral labor comovement," Journal of Economic Dynamics and Control, 33(3): 538-53. (http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.jedc.2008.08.003).

title: Investment Deflator
notes: For additional details see: R. DiCecio (2009). "Sticky wages and sectoral labor comovement," Journal of Economic Dynamics and Control, 33(3): 538-53. (http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.jedc.2008.08.003).

title: Nominal Investment
notes: This series is the sum of nominal GPDI Fixed Investment and PCE Durables.  For additional details see: R. DiCecio (2009). "Sticky wages and sectoral labor comovement," Journal of Economic Dynamics and Control, 33(3): 538-53. (http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.jedc.2008.08.003).

title: Relative Price of Equipment
notes: Relative price of equipment is calculated as equipment deflator (https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/EDEF) divided by consumption deflator (https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CONSDEF).  For additional details see: R. DiCecio (2009). "Sticky wages and sectoral labor comovement," Journal of Economic Dynamics and Control, 33(3): 538-53. (http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.jedc.2008.08.003).

title: Relative Price of Equipment and Software (DISCONTINUED)
notes: Relative price of equipment and software is calculated as equipment and software deflator (https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/ESDEF) divided by consumption deflator (https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CONSDEF).  This series was discontinued. Under the new NIPA organization, Equipment and Software is presented as two separate series. Current relative price of equipment is available at https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/PERIC  For additional details see: R. DiCecio (2009). "Sticky wages and sectoral labor comovement," Journal of Economic Dynamics and Control, 33(3): 538-53. (http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.jedc.2008.08.003).

title: Relative Price of Investment Goods
notes: Relative price of investment goods is calculated as investment deflator (https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/INVDEF) divided by consumption deflator (https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CONSDEF).  For additional details see: R. DiCecio (2009). "Sticky wages and sectoral labor comovement," Journal of Economic Dynamics and Control, 33(3): 538-53. (http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.jedc.2008.08.003).

title: Real Investment
notes: Real Investment is calculated as nominal investment (https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/NINV) divided by investment deflator (https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/INVDEF) multiplied by 100.  For additional details see: R. DiCecio (2009). "Sticky wages and sectoral labor comovement," Journal of Economic Dynamics and Control, 33(3): 538-53. (http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.jedc.2008.08.003).
